page.title: 11MEMORIAL HALL USERS CONT.
page.content: Goxhill Amateur Players meet on the first Wednesday of each month in one of the side rooms of the Memorial Hall. They stage two productions each year on the Hall's stage and rehearse for periods of 7 weeks twice a year on Monday and Wednesday evenings and Sunday afternoons. The Memorial Hall has a number of occasional users. Lincolnshire and Humberside Arts use the premises for some of their shows / exhibitions. Magic shows are held from time to time whilst touring pantomimes and light orchestral music are also occasionally amongst the Hall's attractions. Trade shows and sales e.g. carpets, are also held there. Dog shows and cage bird shows are also annual activities which does not leave much time available for village bazaars, barbecues, social and fund raising activities.
